markdownRemark.html:
This release updates Kubernetes to v1.17.17

Kubernetes v1.17.16 was released to address packaging issues with the v1.17.15 release; there are no corresponding K3s releases.

For more details on what's new, see the Kubernetes release notes

Changes since v1.17.15+k3s1:

  • Upgrade Kubernetes to v1.17.17 (k3s-io/k3s#2809)

Notice

As of v1.17.14+k3s3, the testing channel (available as one of the K3s release channels) ONLY serves pre-releases such as RCs, alphas, and betas. Previously, it served both pre-releases and fully graduated ones.

Embedded Component Versions

Component Version
Kubernetes v1.17.17
SQLite 3.33.0
Containerd v1.3.9-k3s1
Flannel v0.11.0-k3s.1
Metrics-server v0.3.6
Traefik 1.7.19
CoreDNS v1.6.9
Helm-controller v0.4.1
Local-path-provisioner v0.0.11

Helpful Links

As always, we welcome and appreciate feedback from our community of users. Please feel free to:

  • Open issues here
  • Join our Slack channel
  • Check out our documentation for guidance on how to get started.
